column2: Establish and maintain relationships with potential partners, suppliers, and industry stakeholders by attending industry events, conferences, and trade shows to network and identify collaboration opportunities. Address challenges or conflicts that arise during collaborations and work toward effective solutions. Seek ways to maximize the value of partnerships and resolve any issues that may arise. Education and Skill Requirements:              Candidate must possess a masters degree, such as an MBA in Business Management, Marketing can be an advantage, particularly in highly competitive industries.        Candidates with course work in areas like content writing, project management, negotiation, strategic planning, marketing, or international relations will be preferred for the role. A basic understanding of business principles, including market analysis, financial considerations, and risk management.      If you are applying for this role, you must possess good expertise in language, verbal and written communication and control over the vocabulary. column2: CRM (Customer Relationship Management) Head Job Description Overview:  As the CRM Head, you will be responsible for developing and implementing strategies to optimize customer interactions, enhance satisfaction, and drive customer loyalty and retention. You will lead the CRM team in leveraging data, technology, and analytics to deliver personalized and seamless experiences across all touchpoints, ultimately contributing to the company's growth and profitability. Key Responsibilities: Strategy Development:  Develop and execute CRM strategies aligned with business objectives, leveraging customer insights, segmentation, and lifecycle management to drive revenue growth and enhance customer lifetime value. Technology Management:  Oversee the selection, implementation, and management of CRM systems and tools, ensuring they meet the organization's needs and enable efficient and effective customer engagement and communication. Data Management:  Define data capture, storage, and governance standards to ensure data quality, accuracy, and compliance, and oversee the integration of data from various sources to create a unified view of the customer. Customer Segmentation:  Analyze customer data to segment the customer base effectively, identify high-value segments, and tailor marketing messages, offers, and experiences to meet the unique needs and preferences of each segment. Campaign Management:  Lead the planning, execution, and optimization of CRM campaigns across multiple channels, including email, SMS, social media, and direct mail, to drive customer acquisition, retention, and cross-selling opportunities. Performance Analysis:  Define key performance indicators (KPIs) and metrics to track and evaluate the effectiveness of CRM initiatives, analyze campaign performance and customer behavior, and use insights to optimize strategies and tactics. Cross-Functional Collaboration:  Collaborate with marketing, sales, product, and customer service teams to align CRM initiatives with broader business goals, share customer insights and feedback, and ensure consistency and continuity in customer interactions. Customer Experience Enhancement:  Identify pain points and friction in the customer journey and develop initiatives to address them, continuously striving to improve the overall customer experience and satisfaction. Team Leadership:  Lead, mentor, and develop a team of CRM professionals, providing guidance, support, and training to ensure they have the skills and resources needed to excel in their roles and contribute to the success of the CRM function. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field. Master's degree preferred. Proven experience in CRM management, customer lifecycle management, or related roles, with a track record of driving measurable results and improving customer engagement and retention. Deep understanding of CRM principles, practices, and technologies, including CRM platforms (e.g., Salesforce, HubSpot) and marketing automation tools. Strong analytical skills and proficiency in data analysis and interpretation, with the ability to derive actionable insights from customer data. Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to influence and collaborate effectively across functions and levels of the organization. Strategic thinker with the ability to translate business goals into actionable CRM strategies and initiatives. Results-oriented mindset with a focus on driving continuous improvement and delivering tangible business outcomes. Leadership experience, with the ability to inspire, motivate, and develop a high-performing team.
column11: CRM Management, Strategy Development, Customer Experience, Technology, Customer Segmentation, Data Management, Campaign Management, Team Leadership, CRM Strategy, Growth Strategy, Performance Analysis, Customer Engagement

column2: Role Description The Operations Analyst - Salesforce CRM is responsible for supporting the vision, strategy, and implementation of DWS' global CRM program.  The role encompasses daily system operations, user support, the further development and maintenance of the platform, stakeholder alignment with internal sales units as well as close cooperation within the Client Experience, Marketing & Digital Sales team. Your key responsibilities  Support for the day-to-day activities for stales staff within Salesforce CRM (Account & Contact Management, Activities, Campaign Management, Reporting) for 1,500 users around the world Managing case pipeline for incoming requests and support in process documentation Training users in the effective use of the CRM application Covering all aspects of user and license management including new user setup and deactivation, roles, profiles, permissions, public groups and others Identifying and gathering requirements from incoming requests, translating into best practice, scalable solutions with a focus on exceptional user experience Collaborating with the technical delivery teams through the entire development lifecycle, to deliver a high-quality solution that meets the clients needs Handle test management Ad-hoc troubleshooting and collaborating with development teams Running reports for various business needs such as sales reporting, management reporting, data management, and ad-hoc user requests Ensuring that policies and procedures on Salesforce are updated in line with global best practices and local jurisdiction requirements. Your skills and experience CRM related experience is a precondition to qualify for this role. Salesforce is desirable but any CRM experience is acceptable. Understands the basics and basics of user needs for a CRM platform Experience of data migration projects either through initial seeding of CRM systems or data integrations to external systems to enrich existing CRM data, as well as experience of working with business to manage data quality Experience with marketing automation (ideally Salesforce Marketing Cloud) and its data integrations with the CRM preferred Strong analytical, problem solving skills and attention to detail Communication skills in English both written and verbal Bachelor and/or advanced degree.

column2: Company Description   Praxis Group is a Interior Design & Built solutions provider based in Gurugram. We specialize in project design services for residential, commercial, and office interiors in a turnkey model, Design consultation services for new projects as well as renovation services. Our focus is on client satisfaction and delivering high-quality services.     Role Description   This is a full-time on-site role for a BD/Sales & Customer Relationship Management Specialist at Praxis Group office in Gurugram. You will be responsible for identifying and pursuing new business opportunities, building and maintaining client relationships, and achieving sales goals.    The work profile shall include:   Analysing customer data, communicating with clients to understand their needs and gather feedback by implementing and managing (CRM) systems software on Zoho Platform. Develop, implement, and manage our social media strategy to align with business goals on social media platforms such as Twitter, Facebook, Pinterest, YouTube, and LinkedIn etc. Contacting potential clients to establish rapport and arrange meetings and   generate quality leads and grow client network. Planning and overseeing new marketing initiatives to increase the value of current customers while attracting new ones. Travel within Delhi NCR and Pan India for conferences, meetings, and industry events. Attending conferences, meetings, and industry events. Developing quotes and proposals for clients by coordinating with internal teams to address problem statements and client requirements. Developing goals in consultation with the leadership team to ensure business growth for short term & long-term outlook. Coordinating marketing campaigns, analysing data and market trends, creating marketing collateral as per the current dynamics.     Qualifications Proven experience in business development or sales, Knowledge of design and construction industry trends and practices. Bachelors degree in sales /marketing or relevant field. Excellent communication and negotiation skills, Proficiency in English & Hindi is mandatory. Proficiency in MS Office and CRM software. Ability to work well in a team and independently. Self-motivated and target-oriented mindset.

column2: These positions are a part of the team responsible for ideating, managing, and executing various fundraising platforms and event partnerships at United Way Mumbai. The predominant event is the Tata Mumbai Marathon (TMM). TMM is India s biggest philanthropic sporting event, annually raising more than INR 46 crores for nearly 300 nonprofits through numerous corporate partners and individuals supporting them.         As the official philanthropy partner of the TMM, we serve as the philanthropic exchange connecting donors to nonprofits by creating and implementing an organized and structured charity platform. UWM also operates the Monthly Giving platform, allowing users to donate funds to various causes seamlessly every month using a variety of digital payment options.         The Executive will be closely working with existing nonprofits & developing relationships with new, enabling them to raise funds by crafting fundraising opportunities and building capacities. For the TMM, the team member will be required to build rapport with nonprofits, corporates, key individuals and maintain a consistent engagement and help them deepen their philanthropic involvement. For Monthly Giving, the key metric for success would be to acquire new users and convert existing donors to pledge their funding on a more continuous basis.             Job Responsibilities:             Develop in-depth, end-to-end knowledge of the Monthly Giving platform and the Philanthropy Structure     of the TMM and constantly strive to improve it. This includes research, on competing platforms both in India as well internationally               Building an understanding of digital marketing and developing strategies to boost new signups and engagement.         Understanding how, when, and why crowdfunding works and developing strategies around the art and science of crowdfunding and then further sharing the information with nonprofits         Managing the end to end individual fund cycle raising, receiving, accounting, reconciling, disbursing, and reporting         Developing and maintaining an excellent business relationship with the partnered nonprofit s staff, HNIs, and corporate point of contact from handholding and providing constant motivation to problem-solving any issues that they may face in their campaign         Contributing to all activities of the campaigns team including working on new event collaborations           Research, recommend, and incorporate best practices to improve team efficiency             Profile Requisites:             Bachelor s or master s degree with a focus on humanities, marketing, communication, or business administration preferred         Any experience up to a maximum of seven years in client-facing roles in the partnerships, operations, and fundraising team at an NGO or a crowdfunding site would be highly valued. Additional digital marketing experience will be an added advantage. Recent graduates are also invited to apply for starting roles.         Building connections, relationships, and networking         Good listening skills          Ability to connect with people and gain trust quickly         Self-motivated and goal-oriented. Taking initiative and the ability to think out of the box is a required skill for the job         Great command of MS Office         Excellent written and verbal communication skills         Being of a curious mind is a bonus to the position
column11: Business administration, Networking, Associate Vice President, Research, Management, Digital marketing, Fund raising, MS Office, Marketing communication, Strategy development

column2: We are looking for a dynamic and goal driven candidates.      The Transaction Advisory Team Leader is responsible for leading a team of professionals in providing transaction advisory services to clients.      This role requires expertise in financial analysis, due diligence, and M&A (Merger and Acquisition) transactions.      The Team Leader will oversee a group of analysts and associates, ensuring the delivery of high-quality advisory services and meeting client needs.      Key Responsibilities      Team Leadership: Lead and mentor a team of analysts and associates, set clear team goals and objectives, ensure effective communication and collaboration within the team and provide coaching and training to team members to enhance their skills.          Client Engagement: Act as the primary point of contact for clients, understand clients' specific needs and expectations and manage client relationships and maintain a high level of client satisfaction.          Transaction Advisory Services: Oversee due diligence processes for mergers, acquisitions, and other transactions, analyze financial statements and conduct financial modeling, evaluate the financial and operational performance of target companies and prepare comprehensive reports and presentations for clients.          Business Development: Identify opportunities for upselling or cross-selling services to existing clients, participate in new client acquisition and proposal development and contribute to the growth and expansion of the advisory services practice.      Qualifications:          Professional certification such as CA, CFA or MBA.            Proven experience in transaction advisory, M&A, or financial due diligence.            Strong leadership and team management skills.
column11: transaction advisory services, Financial statements, Transaction advisory, Team management, Financial analysis, financial due diligence, M&A, Client acquisition, Operations, Proposal development
